snippet: John Lahr’s biography “Tennessee Williams: Mad Pilgrimage of the Flesh” draws on a wealth of letters and journals to explore the synergy between his life and his plays.
abstract: Theater critic John Lahr biography Tennessee Williams: Mad Pilgrimage of the Flesh is set to be published on Sept 22, 2014, by W W Norton; book draws on wealth of letters and journals to explore synergy between Williams's life and his plays.
lead_paragraph: John Lahr’s biography “Tennessee Williams: Mad Pilgrimage of the Flesh” draws on a wealth of letters and journals to explore the synergy between his life and his plays.

headline.seo: John Lahr’s Biography of Tennessee Williams
headline.main: A Playwright Named Desire: The Battle for Art and Sanity
headline.print_headline: A Playwright Named Desire: The Battle for Art and Sanity
